page.title: 15A Family Week-End
page.content: SATURDAY: In the morning Daniel (my brother) and I go to badminton at the College sports hall. My Mother stays at home and makes some bread. My Father stays at home and does any jobs that need doing. We get home from badminton at 11.00am. About an hour later we have lunch, which is usually salad. In the afternoon we either go out in the country or to other places of interest. If we don't go out Daniel and I play with our friends. My Mum & Dad work around the house. At about 6.15pm we have our main meal. For the rest of the evening we watch T.V. At 10.30 we go to bed. SUNDAY: In the morning we go to Church at about 11.00am till 12.15. At 1.00 we have Sunday Lunch. In the afternoon we work & play. At 6.00 we have a snack. During the rest of the evening we have a bath or shower. At 9.00 bed.
